Package com.deco2800.game.components.bridge

Class Bridge

java.lang.Object
com.deco2800.game.components.bridge.Bridge
All Implemented Interfaces:
Location
public class Bridge
extends java.lang.Object
implements Location
The Bridge class representing the rainbow bridge in Ragnorak Racer.

      public Bridge​(int offset, int width)
      Parameters:

      width - set the width size for a lane
